snippet: Mr. Marshall, along with one of Brooke Astor’s former lawyers, was found guilty of criminal charges that they swindled millions from her after she was stricken with Alzheimer’s disease.
abstract: Anthony D Marshall, only son of philanthropist-socialite Brooke Astor, dies at age 90; after a lifetime of public service and creative accomplishments, Marshall was convicted of swindling millions of dollars from his mother after she was stricken with Alzheimer's disease.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Marshall, along with one of Brooke Astor’s former lawyers, was found guilty of criminal charges that they swindled millions from her after she was stricken with Alzheimer’s disease.

headline.main: Anthony D. Marshall, Astor Son Who Was Convicted in Swindle, Dies at 90
headline.print_headline: Anthony Marshall, 90, Astor Son Who Was Convicted in Estate Swindle, Dies
